actions.text: Mr. Gephardt rose to a question of the privileges of the House and sent to the desk a resolution.
DEBATE - The Chair recognized Mr. Gephardt for one hour. By unanimous consent, the time for debate was equally divided between Mr. Gephardt and Mr. Lewis of California.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 253 - 162 (Roll no. 5).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 254 - 160 (Roll no. 6).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Directing the Committee on House Administration to investigate the operation and management of the Office of the Postmaster.

summary.text: Directs the Committee on House Administration to investigate the operation and management of the Office of the Postmaster and report back to the House no later than May 30, 1992.

titles.title: Directing the Committee on House Administration to investigate the operation and management of the Office of the Postmaster.
